sentence.Network_en: This is just a little keepsake for your birthday.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是我的一点小意思,送给你做生日礼物.

sentence.Network_en: My friend gave me his picture as a keepsake before going away.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的朋友在离别前给我一张照片留作纪念.

sentence.Network_en: He gave me his picture as a keepsake before going away.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在离开前送我一张照片做为纪念.

list.abs: Please have this ring keepsake ., 请收下这个戒指作为信物.
you can try on those clothes you forgot you had or walk down memory lane with those special keepsakes in that box in the back .你可以穿穿那些已经被你遗忘的衣服，试试那些在后面盒子里装着的特别纪念品。

a meaningful artifact ( photograph , family heirloom , sentimental object or keepsake ) . if you choose a photograph , you may to append a copy to your exercise .一个有意义的物件（照片、传家宝、感性的物品或纪念品)。如果你选择照片，你可能需要在练习作业里附上一张。
A keepsake or souvenir ., 纪念品或留念.

entry.def: A keepsake is a small present that someone gives you so that you will not forget them.

auth_sentence.content: It's a keepsake for me, just a memento.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a keepsake for me, just a memento.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a keepsake for me, just a memento.

auth_sentence.content: It's worth remembering that others may value a keepsake.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's worth remembering that others may value a keepsake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's worth remembering that others may value a keepsake.

auth_sentence.content: But turning all those digital photos into keepsake books can be time consuming.
auth_sentence.res_content: But turning all those digital photos into keepsake books can be time consuming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But turning all those digital photos into keepsake books can be time consuming.

sentences.en: Would you mind if I took one of the pictures as a keepsake?
sentences.cn: 我拿走一张画作纪念,你有意见吗?
